V-50549.Title: The xinetd service must be uninstalled if no network services utilizing it are enabled.

V-50551.Title: The telnet-server package must not be installed.

V-50553.Title: The telnet daemon must not be running.

V-50555.Title: The rsh-server package must not be installed.

V-50557.Title: The rshd service must not be running.

V-50559.Title: The rexecd service must not be running.

V-50561.Title: The rlogind service must not be running.

V-50563.Title: The ypserv package must not be installed.

V-50567.Title: The tftp-server package must not be installed.

V-50571.Title: The cron service must be running.

V-50573.Title: The SSH daemon must be configured to use only the SSHv2 protocol.

V-50575.Title: The SSH daemon must set a timeout interval on idle sessions.

V-50577.Title: The SSH daemon must set a timeout count on idle sessions.

V-50579.Title: The SSH daemon must ignore .rhosts files.

V-50581.Title: The SSH daemon must not allow host-based authentication.

V-50591.Title: The system package management tool must verify group-ownership on all files and directories associated with packages.

V-50593.Title: The system package management tool must verify ownership on all files and directories associated with packages.

V-50609.Title: The operating system, upon successful logon, must display to the user the date and time of the last logon or access via ssh.

V-50643.Title: There must be no .netrc files on the system.

V-50647.Title: The system must not accept IPv4 source-routed packets by default.

V-50655.Title: The system must ignore IPv4 ICMP redirect messages.

V-50657.Title: The system must not respond to ICMPv4 sent to a broadcast address.

V-50663.Title: The system must ignore ICMPv4 bogus error responses.

V-50667.Title: The system default umask in /etc/login.defs must be 077.

V-50669.Title: The system default umask in /etc/profile must be 077.

V-50683.Title: The system must be configured to use TCP syncookies.

V-50685.Title: The system must use a reverse-path filter for IPv4 network traffic when possible on all interfaces.

V-50699.Title: The system must use a reverse-path filter for IPv4 network traffic when possible by default.

V-50721.Title: The system must prevent the root account from logging in from virtual consoles.

V-50725.Title: The system must prevent the root account from logging in from serial consoles.

V-50731.Title: Default system accounts, other than root, must be locked.

V-50741.Title: The /etc/passwd file must not contain password hashes.

V-50747.Title: The root account must be the only account having a UID of 0.

V-50753.Title: The /etc/shadow file must be owned by root.

V-50755.Title: The /etc/shadow file must be group-owned by root.

V-50759.Title: The /etc/gshadow file must be owned by root.

V-50763.Title: The /etc/gshadow file must be group-owned by root.

V-50769.Title: The /etc/passwd file must be owned by root.

V-50771.Title: The /etc/passwd file must be group-owned by root.

V-50773.Title: The /etc/passwd file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

V-50775.Title: The /etc/group file must be owned by root.

V-50777.Title: The /etc/group file must be group-owned by root.

V-50779.Title: The /etc/group file must have mode 0644 or less permissive.

V-50783.Title: Library files must have mode 0755 or less permissive.

V-50785.Title: Library files must be owned by root.

V-50787.Title: All system command files must have mode 755 or less permissive.

V-50789.Title: All system command files must be owned by root.

V-50801.Title: The SSH daemon must not allow authentication using an empty password.

V-50805.Title: The SSH daemon must not permit user environment settings.

V-50821.Title: The openldap-servers package must not be installed unless required.

V-50831.Title: The Automatic Bug Reporting Tool (abrtd) service must not be running.

V-50837.Title: The ntpdate service must not be running.

V-50839.Title: The oddjobd service must not be running.

V-50841.Title: The qpidd service must not be running.

V-50843.Title: The rdisc service must not be running.

V-50871.Title: There must be no world-writable files on the system.

V-50881.Title: The sendmail package must be removed.

V-50883.Title: The netconsole service must be disabled unless required.

V-50885.Title: X Windows must not be enabled unless required.

V-50903.Title: The operating system must connect to external networks or information systems only through managed IPv4 interfaces consisting of boundary protection devices arranged in accordance with an organizational security architecture.

V-50927.Title: The system must use a FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hashing algorithm for generating account password hashes (login.defs).

V-50933.Title: The system boot loader configuration file(s) must be owned by root.

V-50939.Title: The system boot loader configuration file(s) must be group-owned by root.

V-50943.Title: The system boot loader configuration file(s) must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

V-50953.Title: The system must allow locking of the console screen in text mode.

V-50957.Title: The system must implement virtual address space randomization.

V-50969.Title: The system must not accept IPv4 source-routed packets on any interface.

V-50971.Title: The system must not accept ICMPv4 redirect packets on any interface.

V-50973.Title: All GIDs referenced in /etc/passwd must be defined in /etc/group.

V-50985.Title: All accounts on the system must have unique user or account names.

V-51007.Title: All rsyslog-generated log files must be owned by root.

V-51009.Title: All rsyslog-generated log files must be group-owned by root.

V-51013.Title: All rsyslog-generated log files must have mode 0600 or less permissive.

V-51041.Title: Process core dumps must be disabled unless needed.

V-51115.Title: The system must limit users to 10 simultaneous system logins, or a site-defined number, in accordance with operational requirements.

V-51423.Title: All public directories must be owned by a system account.
